long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Healthcare Digital Marketing for Chrome serves as a robust Follow-Up Management Assistant, meticulously crafted to enhance your organizational and business efficiency and task tracking. This extension empowers you to effortlessly oversee and handle all follow-up responsibilities, guaranteeing that no vital task is overlooked. Its primary function revolves around facilitating businesses in following up with prospective clients through the Whatsapp Web application. The LitLup extension generates pre-defined message templates for each follow-up task, requiring the user to manually send the messages via Whatsapp Web.
